apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this romantic emoji depicts two men with medium and medium-light skin tones leaning in for a gentle kiss, their faces rendered with soft, rounded edges and realistic lighting that highlights their affectionate gaze.  The subtle blush on their cheeks and the warm color palette underscore the intimacy and tenderness of the moment, a hallmark of Apple's expressive emoji design.  It's a beautiful way to convey love, affection, and romantic connection between two men.
